text: Jeff Gladney (December 12, 1996 â€“ May 30, 2022) was an American professional football player. He was a cornerback in the National Football League (NFL) for two seasons from 2020 until 2022 for the Minnesota Vikings and Arizona Cardinals. Gladney played college football for the TCU Horned Frogs. Gladney was born in New Boston, Texas. Gladney was killed in a car crash in Dallas, Texas on May 30, 2022 at the age of 25. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American football cornerbacks Category:Minnesota Vikings players Category:Arizona Cardinals players Category:Sportspeople from Dallas Category:Road accident deaths in the United States
title: Jeff Gladney
